CustomField.description: Time Trigger used to send Hipchat Updates 5 mins before Plat P1 SLA
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.HCOW__c ,ISPICKVAL( Priority , "P1")), (CreatedDate + 0.01041666), IF(AND( Account.HCOW__c ,ISPICKVAL( Priority , "P2")), (CreatedDate + 0.02083333), IF(AND(Account.HCOW__c ,ISPICKVAL( Priority , "P3")), (CreatedDate + 0.04166666), null) ) )
CustomField.label: Plat Trigger Time SLA
